column4: hi there i'm having problems with skype, it is showing another skype instance may exist
how can i resolve this problem with out restarting the comp
i tried killall skype in terminal already
i'mg getting this error with skype, the other skype instance may exist , how can i resolve this problem without restarting skype
without restarting comp
yeah coz i have lots file opend up
ps aux | grep skype does it list anything?  If so kill the process or process name.
how do i kill the process ?
kill PID# or "killall PROCESS_NAME"
run either of the above command, then verify with the "ps aux.." again to verify it's killed
are you sure skype is the process name?
if you tried kill and it failed it's time for -9.  "killall -9 skype"
no that's the search ;)
so it should work now
yup
nice dude thanks ~ what does killall -9 do ?
yeap is working now thanks ^^
ONLY use that in emergencies - it kills without asking permission
a regular kill or killall is basically asking a process to stop, the -9 just stops it.
thanks !!
works like a charm
glad to help
